      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Pressure on a drawing pin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Druck auf einem zeichnenden Stift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pression sur une broche de dessin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão em um pino desenhando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pressione su un perno dissipante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίεση σε μια καρφίτσα σχεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presión en un contacto que traza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustrates the pressure on a drawing pin. Pressure is the force applied over an area.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drawing pin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses veranschaulicht den Druck auf einem 
zeichnenden Stift. Druck ist die Kraft, die über einem Bereich 
aufgewendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci illustre la pression sur une broche de 
dessin. La pression est la force appliquée au-dessus d'une 
zone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto ilustra a pressão em um pino desenhando. 
A pressão é a força aplicada sobre uma área.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò illustra la pressione su un perno dissipante.
La pressione è la forza applicata sopra una zona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό επεξηγεί την πίεση σε μια καρφίτσα σχεδίων. 
Η πίεση είναι η δύναμη που εφαρμόζεται πέρα από μια 
περιοχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto ilustra la presión en un contacto que traza.
La presión es la fuerza aplicada sobre un área.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeichnender Stift</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
